solution_line_template: The cost of the Lyft ride is ${uber_cost} - ${uber_vs_lyft_diff} = $<<{uber_cost}-{uber_vs_lyft_diff}={lyft_cost}>>{lyft_cost}
The original cost of the taxi ride is ${lyft_cost} - ${lyft_vs_taxi_diff} = $<<{lyft_cost}-{lyft_vs_taxi_diff}={taxi_cost}>>{taxi_cost}
The total cost of the ride downtown is ${taxi_cost} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{taxi_cost}+{tip_amount}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
